distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for transfig fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-14275: Fixed stack-based buffer overflow in the calc_arrow function (bsc#1143650).
- CVE-2018-16140: Fixed a buffer underwrite vulnerability in get_line() in
  read.c, which allowed an attacker to write prior to the beginning of the
  buffer via specially crafted .fig file (bsc#1106531)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A buffer underwrite vulnerability in get_line() (read.c) in fig2dev 3.2.7a allows an attacker to write prior to the beginning of the buffer via a crafted .fig file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
